@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+    <parent>
+        <artifactId>HW_5_17</artifactId>
+        <groupId>spring.cloud.ss</groupId>
+        <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    </parent>
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <artifactId>RestSerProducts</artifactId>
+
+    <properties>
+        <maven.compiler.source>8</maven.compiler.source>
+        <maven.compiler.target>8</maven.compiler.target>
+    </properties>
+
+    <dependencies>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.flywaydb</groupId>
+            <artifactId>flyway-core</artifactId>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>com.h2database</groupId>
+            <artifactId>h2</artifactId>
+            <scope>runtime</scope>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
+            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId>
+        </dependency>
+
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.springframework.cloud</groupId>
+            <artifactId>spring-cloud-starter-netflix-eureka-client</artifactId>
+        </dependency>
+     </dependencies>
+
+
+
+</project>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+
+server:
+  port: 12345
+  #servlet:
+    #context-path: /rest
+spring:
+  application:
+    name: rest-ser-products
+  #datasource:
+   # driver-class-name: org.h2.Driver
+   # url: jdbc:h2:mem:mydatabase;MODE=PostgreSQL
+   # username: sa
+   # password:
+  #jpa:
+   # show-sql: true
+   # properties:
+   #   hibernate:
+   #     dialect: org.hibernate.dialect.H2Dialect
+  #h2:
+   # console:
+    #  enabled: true
+    #  settings:
+     #   web-allow-others: false
+eureka:
+  client:
+    service-url: #serviceUrl
+      defaultZone: ${EUREKA_URI:http://localhost:8113/eureka}
+    fetch-registry: true #fetchRegistry or fetch-Registry
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@
+CREATE TABLE products_tbl (
+    product_id       bigserial PRIMARY KEY,
+    title_fld        VARCHAR(255),
+    price_fld        INT,
+    created_at       TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+    updated_at       TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
+    );
+INSERT INTO products_tbl (title_fld, price_fld)
+VALUES
+('Re', 2900),
+('StM', 3200),
+('LaW1', 3500),
+('LaW2', 3700),
+('LaM1', 6500),
+('Re2', 4600),
+('StW3', 5900);
+
+

@@ -0,0 +1,10 @@

+  application:
+    name: client-test
+server:
+  port: 19872
+eureka:
+  client:
+    serviceUrl:
+      defaultZone: ${EUREKA_URI:http://localhost:8113/eureka}
+    fetchRegistry: true

@@ -0,0 +1,7 @@
+Вам надо собрать отдельный проект на:
+1. Запускаете Eureka Server
+2. Делаете 2 микросервиса:
+  - Rest Service - управлялка продуктами (репо + сервис + контр)
+  - фронт сервис на thymeleaf, который умеет отобржать продукты на html странице
+3. * Добавить zuul proxy
+4. ** Вместо thymeleaf возьмите AngularJS
\ No newline at end of file

 	xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
 	<modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
 
+	<packaging>pom</packaging>
+
+	<modules>
+		<module>RestSerProducts</module>
+		<module>client-test</module>
+		<module>front-products</module>
+		<module>zool-ser</module>
+		<module>ser-eureka</module>
+	</modules>
+
 	<parent>
 		<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>

-		<version>2.4.3</version>
+		<version>2.3.9.RELEASE</version>
 		<relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
 	</parent>

@@ -0,0 +1,31 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+    <parent>
+        <artifactId>HW_5_17</artifactId>
+        <groupId>spring.cloud.ss</groupId>
+        <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    </parent>
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <artifactId>zool-ser</artifactId>
+
+    <properties>
+        <maven.compiler.source>8</maven.compiler.source>
+        <maven.compiler.target>8</maven.compiler.target>
+    </properties>
+
+    <dependencies>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.springframework.cloud</groupId>
+            <artifactId>spring-cloud-starter-netflix-eureka-client</artifactId>
+        </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.springframework.cloud</groupId>
+            <artifactId>spring-cloud-starter-netflix-zuul</artifactId>
+        </dependency>
+
+    </dependencies>
+
+</project>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+spring:
+  application:
+    name: zuul-service-ss
+server:
+  port: 1313
+  servlet:
+    context-path: /cloud
+eureka:
+  client:
+    registerWithEureka: true
+    fetchRegistry: true
+    serviceUrl:
+      defaultZone: ${EUREKA_URI:http://localhost:8113/eureka}
+
+zuul:
+  routes:
+    rest-ser-products: /api/v1/products/**
+    client-test: /test/**
+
+
